meanings.definition: A genre of music characterized by electronic beats and catchy melodies.
meanings.sent1: I love dancing to technopops at parties.
meanings.sent2: The radio station played technopops all night long.

meanings.sent5: The catchy tunes of technopops stayed in my head for days.
